title: Claim submitted
downloadClaim:
Download your claim

The questions you’ve answered are populated on our prescribed PDF form. This means the questions may appear differently in their wording or order on the version you download. This will not affect how the tribunal deals with your claim.
downloadClaimHint: The questions you’ve answered are populated on our prescribed PDF form. This means the questions may appear differently in their wording or order on the version you download. This will not affect how the tribunal deals with your claim.
downloadBtnText: Save a copy of your claim
emailConfirmation: We've sent you an email confirmation.
whatHappensNextItemOne: We'll check your claim and may contact you if we have any questions
whatHappensNextItemTwo: We'll contact you once we've sent your claim to the respondents and explain what happens next
claimQuestionsText: Contact the following tribunal office if you have any questions about your specific claim:
processQuestions: For questions about the employment tribunal process
processQuestionsText: Call one of our Employment Tribunal customer contact centres. They cannot give you legal advice.
contactAppend: Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm Find out more about call charges

survey.text: Complete this short survey to help improve this service for you and others.

Unassigned: Unassigned - We will notify you once your claim has been assigned to a tribunal office
